attributes.action: Stop school management discriminating against ex forces student teachers
attributes.additional_details:
A time served ex forces person was discriminated again by a school who decided to cancel the 3rd year student teachers placement, but only after learning the student teacher with over 20 years military and private sector experience, was ex forces.

The cited the reason "they had previously had a bad experience with someone from the forces"

what message does this send to the future generations when the management at the school is so discriminatory

Please sign this petition if you respect the experience and value of HM Forces experience
